Group.Title: Chart
Group.Description: Plot over 20 chart types ranging from line charts to specialized financial charts.
Group.SearchTags: chart,data visualization,graph,financial Chart, line, spline, data marker, zooming, step line, bar, column, area, step area, pie, doughnut, pyramid, funnel, bubble, scatter, range column, range area, candle, ohlc, polar, radar, stacked column, stacked bar, 100% stacked column, 100% stacked bar, stacked area, 100% stacked area, trackball, live data, axis, numerical axis, log axis, datetime axis, strip line, data selection, zooming, tooltip,data marker, technical indicator

Sample.Name: Trackball
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the trackball feature. Trackball displays the tooltip for the data points that are closer to the point where you touch on the chart area.
Sample.Title: Trackball

Sample.Name: LiveUpdate
Sample.Description: This Sample illustrates the performance of SfChart in real time update scenario.
Sample.Title: Live Update

Sample.Name: CategoryAxis
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the use of category axis in chart.Category Axis is an indexed based axis that plots values based on its index in the data source.
Sample.Title: Category Axis

Sample.Name: NumericAxis
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the use of numerical axis in chart. Numerical axis is used to plot numeric values.
Sample.Title: Numerical Axis

Sample.Name: LogarithmicAxis
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the use of logarithmic axis in chart.
Sample.Title: Logarithmic Axis

Sample.Name: DateTimeAxis
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the use of date time axis
Sample.Title: DateTime Axis

Sample.Name: StripLines
Sample.Description: Strip lines are used to highlight specific range in the chart. They can be horizontal or vertical and also be made to optionally repeat at specific intervals.
Sample.Title: Strip Lines

Sample.Name: MultipleAxes
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the use of multiple axes in chart.
Sample.Title: Multiple Axes

Sample.Name: DataPointSelection
Sample.Description: Selection aloows you to highlight a data point. You can select a data point by tapping on it.
Sample.Title: Data Point Selection

Sample.Name: ZoomingAndPanning
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the zooming and panning capablities of chart.
Sample.Title: Zooming and panning

Sample.Name: VerticalChart
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the vertical charts feature.
Sample.Title: Vertical Chart

Sample.Name: Tooltip
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the tooltip capablities in chart. Tooltip feature is used to show information about the segment when you tap on the segment.
Sample.Title: Tooltip

Sample.Name: DataMarkerCustomization
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the customization of data markers. Data markers are used to provide information about the data points to the user.
Sample.Title: Data Marker

Sample.Name: AutoScrolling
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates the automatic scrolling of axis during real time updates.
Sample.Title: Auto Scrolling

Sample.Name: TechnicalIndicator
Sample.Description: Technical indicators are the base for technical analysis which is used to determine the future of financial stock or economic trends.
Sample.Title: Technical Indicator

Group.Title: DataGrid
Group.Description: Full-featured grid control with advanced features like grouping, sorting, filtering and export to excel.

Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Name: GridGettingStarted
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the DataGrid with ObservableCollection as the data source.

Sample.Title: Sorting
Sample.Name: Sorting
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the sorting capabilities of data in DataGrid that allows you to sort against one or more columns and also provides tri-state sorting functionality.

Sample.Title: Custom Sorting
Sample.Name: CustomSorting
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the custom sorting capabilities in DataGrid that enables you to implement custom sorting logic.

Sample.Title: Filtering
Sample.Name: Filtering
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the filtering capabilities of data in DataGrid.

Sample.Title: Frozen Row
Sample.Name: FrozenRow
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the freeze panes capability of DataGrid which provides support to freeze rows at the top.

Sample.Title: Cell Template
Sample.Name: CellTemplate
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the template column feature of DataGrid which provides support for loading templates to the column.

Sample.Title: Grouping
Sample.Name: Grouping
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the grouping capability of data in DataGrid.

Sample.Title: Custom Grouping
Sample.Name: CustomGrouping
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the custom grouping capabilities in DataGrid which enables you to implement custom grouping logic.

Sample.Title: Selection
Sample.Name: Selection
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the selection capability of DataGrid which provides selection mode options like single, multiple, single-deselect and none.

Sample.Title: Editing
Sample.Name: Editing
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the editing capabilities of DataGrid which provides support to edit GridTextColumn, GridNumericColumn, GridPickerColumn and GridDateTimeColumn.

Sample.Title: Resizing
Sample.Name: Resizing
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the resizing capabilities of DataGrid which provides resizing mode options like on-moved and on-touch-up.

Sample.Title: Grid Columns
Sample.Name: GridColumns
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the columns capability of DataGrid which provides support for text, image and switch columns.

Sample.Title: Drag And Drop
Sample.Name: DragAndDrop
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the column and row drag and drop capabilities of DataGrid which provide user flexibility when interacting with the grid rows and grid columns.

Sample.Title: Unbound Column
Sample.Name: UnBoundColumn
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the unbound column capability of DataGrid. Unbound columns are extra columns that do not belong to the data source.

Sample.Title: Conditional Styling
Sample.Name: ConditionalFormatting
Sample.Description: The data grid control for Xamarin is a high-performance grid component that is used to display the data in a tabular format.

Sample.Title: Styles
Sample.Name: DataGridStyles
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the styling capabilities of DataGrid. Styling allows you to change the visual appearance of the DataGrid and its inner elements.

Sample.Title: Auto Row Height
Sample.Name: AutoRowHeight
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the auto row height feature of DataGrid which renders grid rows based on its content to improve the readability and occurs on-demand basis.

Sample.Title: Diagonal Scrolling
Sample.Name: DiagonalScrolling
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the diagonal scrolling feature of DataGrid which enables to scroll the grid diagonally.

Sample.Title: Load More
Sample.Name: LoadMore
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the load more capability of DataGrid that allows you to load a subset of data to the bound data source using built-in UI.

Sample.Title: Pull To Refresh
Sample.Name: PullToRefresh
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the pull-to-refresh capability of DataGrid which allows you to refresh the data source upon pull-to-refresh action.

Sample.Title: Paging
Sample.Name: Paging
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the paging capabilities of DataGrid using SfDataPager which allows you to load the data from the data source in an efficient way.

Sample.Title: Swiping
Sample.Name: Swiping
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the swiping capabilities of DataGrid which allow you to load swipe views and associate them with custom actions.

Sample.Title: Rendering Dynamic Data
Sample.Name: RenderingDynamicData
Sample.Description: This sample illustrates the frequent updates that occur in random cells across the Grid while keeping processor usage to a minimum in the DataGrid.

Sample.Title: Exporting
Sample.Name: Exporting
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the excel and pdf exporting capabilities of DataGrid. DataGrid also provides you various customization options for exporting.

Group.Title: ListView
Group.Description: Advanced ListView component with features like grid layout, grouping, pull-to-refresh and filtering.

Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Name: ListViewGettingStarted
Sample.Description: This sample illustrates about getting started with ListView by loading a set of data items with predefined template.

Sample.Title: Grid Layout
Sample.Name: ListViewGridLayout
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the grid layout which arranges the items in a predefined number of columns.

Sample.Title: Grouping
Sample.Name: ListViewGrouping
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the grouping capability of ListView which also provides support to freeze the group headers in view when grouped.

Sample.Title: Horizontal Orientation
Sample.Name: ListViewOrientation
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the horizontal orientation support in ListView where the items are arranged in a horizontal manner.

Sample.Title: Selection
Sample.Name: ListViewSelection
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the selection capability of ListView which provides selection mode options like Single, Multiple and None.

Sample.Title: Sorting and Filtering
Sample.Name: ListViewSortingFiltering
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the sorting and filtering capabilities of ListView.

Sample.Title: Swiping
Sample.Name: ListViewSwiping
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the swiping functionalities of ListView which allows you to load the swipe views and associate them with custom actions.

Sample.Title: Pull To Refresh
Sample.Name: ListViewPullToRefresh
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the pull-to-refresh capability of ListView which allows you to refresh the data source upon pull-to-refresh action.

Sample.Title: Autofit Items
Sample.Name: ListViewAutoFitContent
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the autofit feature of ListView which automatically re-size the items based on its content dynamically.

Group.Title: AutoComplete
Group.Description: Provide useful suggestions to users based on the already typed content.

Group.Title: NumericTextBox
Group.Description: An advanced version of the text box control that restricts input to numeric values.

Group.Title: Calendar
Group.Description: Month-View calendar interface for displaying events and selecting dates.

Group.Title: NavigationDrawer
Group.Description: The navigation drawer control is a sliding panel that can be used to hide content like menus from the visible area of the screen.

Group.Title: Gauge
Group.Description: Visualize numeric data using Circular, linear and Digital gauge controls.

Group.Title: RangeNavigator
Group.Description: The Range navigator control provides an intuitive interface for selecting a smaller range from a large collection.

Group.Title: Schedule
Group.SearchTags: schedule,appointment,month,calendar,event,week,planner, day, recurrence, work week, timeslots, timeline.
Group.Description: Powerful calendar interface with appointment management capabilities.

Sample.Name: Schedule_View
Sample.Title: Getting started
Sample.Description: Schedule control allows to view the days in multiple views such as day , week, work week and month view

Sample.Name: Recurrence
Sample.Title: Recurring appointments
Sample.Description: Schedule control provides support to add and manage recursive appointments

Sample.Name: Localization
Sample.Title: Localization
Sample.Description: Schedule control allows localization support to required culture

Sample.Name: Configurations
Sample.Title: View configuration
Sample.Description: Schedule control allows to configure various properties available in the views, it also supports non-accesble blocks

Sample.Name: Customization
Sample.Title: Appointment customization
Sample.Description: Schedule control allows customizable view for month cell, appointments, timslots and header

Group.Title: Kanban
Group.Description: The Kanban control provides an efficient interface to track and visualize the different stages in a task or workflow.

Group.Title: Picker
Group.Description: Highly customizable picker control with features like cascading selection.

Group.Title: ImageEditor
Group.Description: The image editor control lets users annotate images with freehand drawing, text and shapes. It is also possible to perform simple image manipulation operations like cropping,flipping and rotation.

Group.Title: PullToRefresh
Group.Description: Panel control with built-in support for triggering refresh when the user performs a pull-down action.

Sample.Title: Pull To Refresh With SfListView
Sample.Name: ListViewPullToRefresh
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the pull-to-refresh capability of ListView which allows you to refresh the data source upon pull-to-refresh action.

Group.Title: RadialMenu
Group.Description: The radial menu control displays menu items in a circular layout. It can accommodate more menu items in the given space than the traditional vertical or horizontal menus.

Group.Title: SunburstChart
Group.Description: Visualize hierarchical data using concentric circle layout.

Group.Title: Maps
Group.Description: Easily visualize business data over a geographical map.

Group.Title: TreeMap
Group.Description: The tree map control provides a simple yet effective way to visualize flat or hierarchical data as clustered rectangles.

Group.Title: Barcode
Group.SearchTags: Barcode, SfBarcode, QR code, 1D, 2D, Codabar, code 128, UPC, Datamatrix, code 93, code 11, code 32
Group.Description: Easily generate one and two-dimensional barcodes including QR codes within your applications.

Group.Title: Sparkline
Group.Description: Sparkline's are small charts typically drawn to depict trends in data.

Group.Title: RangeSlider
Group.Description: The Range slider control allows the user to select the range of values within the specified minimum and maximum limits.

Group.Title: BusyIndicator
Group.Description: Pre-built animations to indicate busy status within your applications.

Group.Title: Rating
Group.Description: The rating control allows users to select a rating value from a group of visual symbols.

Group.Title: Carousel
Group.Description: Provides an intuitive interface for navigating through a collection of views.

Group.Title: Rotator
Group.Description: The rotator control provides an interactive way to navigate through a collection of views. Various navigation options like swiping, auto-play and tapping are supported.

Group.Title: NumericUpDown
Group.Description: Restricts input to numeric values and provides buttons to easily increment and decrement values.

Group.Title: Calculate

Sample.Name: FunctionsLibrary
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates the calculation using various Excel-like functions.

Group.Title: XlsIO
Group.SearchTags: XlsIO,Excel,Workbook,sheet, Spreadsheet, formula, charts, import data, export data, data validation, conditional formatting, filters, sorting, find and replace, template marker, XLS, XLSX, pivot, Excel tables, formatting, styles. merge cells,range,cell,row,column,number format, named range
Group.Description: .NET class library for creating and modifying Microsoft Excel workbooks.

Sample.Name: CreateSpreadsheetPage
Sample.Title: Create Spreadsheet
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports to create an Excel document without any dependency of Microsoft Excel in few lines of code.

Sample.Name: ChartsPage
Sample.Title: Charts
Sample.Description: Create and manipulate all types of Excel charts with elements like chart title, legend, axis title, data labels, line styles, etc.

Sample.Name: FormulasPage
Sample.Title: Formulas
Sample.Description: XlsIO has support to read, write and calculate formulas. The built-in calculation engine can quickly evaluate formula cell values at runtime.

Sample.Name: ImportBusinessObjectsPage
Sample.Title: Business Objects
Sample.Description: Business objects usually holds a set of instance variables or properties, also known as attributes. XlsIO allows to import data directly from business objects.

Sample.Name: ImportXMLPage
Sample.Title: Import XML Data
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports single line of code to import XML data into an Excel worksheet.

Sample.Name: FiltersPage
Sample.Title: Filters
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports data filtering based on text, date and custom options.

Sample.Name: FindAndReplacePage
Sample.Title: Find and Replace
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports to find the range of a value in the worksheet and replace it with a new value.

Group.Title: DocIO
Group.Description: .NET class library for creating and modifying Microsoft Word documents.

Sample.Name: GettingStartedDocIO
Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create simple Word document with text, images and tables.

Sample.Name: BuiltInStyle
Sample.Title: Built-in Style
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to format the Word document contents with the built-in styles.

Sample.Name: CustomStyle
Sample.Title: Custom Style
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to format the Word document contents with user defined styles.

Sample.Name: BookmarkNavigation
Sample.Title: Bookmark Navigation
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to insert, retrieve, replace and delete the contents of a specified bookmark using BookmarkNavigator functionality of DocIO.

Sample.Name: DocIO_PieChart
Sample.Title: Pie Chart
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create a pie chart in a Word document.

Sample.Name: DocIO_BarChart
Sample.Title: Bar Chart
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create a bar chart in a Word document with the data from an existing Excel file.

Sample.Name: MailMerge
Sample.Title: Mail Merge
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create a letter format document by filling the data using Mail merge functionality of DocIO.

Sample.Name: FormFillingAndProtection
Sample.Title: Form Filling and Protection
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to fill data and protect the content controls in an existing Word document.

Sample.Name: XMLMapping
Sample.Title: XML Mapping
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to map custom XML part to content controls in the Word document.

Sample.Name: WordToHTML
Sample.Title: Word to HTML
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to convert a Word document into HTML file.
